column2: OTE: The variables in this section are recoded variables that were created from one or more of the variables from three of the preceding sections:

column1: <s>Recoded Drug Use, Emerging Issues, or Imputed Emerging Issues.</s>

column2: Len : 1    RC-PERCEIVED EVER HAD DRUG OR ALCOHOL USE PROBLEM
Len : 1    RC-PERCEIVED RECOVERY FROM DRUG OR ALCOHOL USE PROBLEM
Len : 1    RC-PERCEIVED EVER HAD A MENTAL HEALTH ISSUE
Len : 1    RC-PERCEIVED RECOVERY FROM MENTAL HEALTH ISSUE
Len : 1    RC-ONLY FLAVORING VAPING - EVER USED
Len : 1    RC-ONLY FLAVORING VAPING - PAST YEAR USE
